description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，因作战勇猛而被称为“王疯子”。他是小说《亮剑》主角李云龙的原型之一。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, known as 'Madman Wang' for his fierceness in battle. He is one of the prototypes for Li Yunlong, the protagonist of the novel 'Drawing Sword'.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。

description.en: The protagonist of the novel 'Drawing Sword', partially based on Wang Jinshan.

description.en: A founding father of the People's Republic of China, who ruled as the chairman of the Communist Party of China from its establishment in 1949 until his death.

description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China and one of the founders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任上海市市长、国务院副总理兼外交部长。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who served as Mayor of Shanghai, Vice Premier, and Foreign Minister.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家，曾任国务院总理和中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: A politician in the People's Republic of China, who served as Premier of the State Council and General Secretary of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 王近山与韩岫岩是夫妻关系，后于1964年离婚。
description.en: Wang Jinshan and Han Xiuyan were married, and they divorced in 1964.

description.zh-cn: 与韩岫岩离婚后，王近山与黄慎荣结婚。
description.en: After divorcing Han Xiuyan, Wang Jinshan married Huang Shenrong.

description.zh-cn: 因王近山与其妻妹韩秀荣的交往，王近山与妻子韩岫岩发生矛盾，最终导致离婚。
description.en: Due to Wang Jinshan's association with his sister-in-law Han Xiurong, conflicts arose between him and his wife Han Xiuyan, ultimately leading to their divorce.

description.zh-cn: 韩秀荣是韩岫岩的妹妹。
description.en: Han Xiurong is the younger sister of Han Xiuyan.

description.zh-cn: 王近山于1932年加入中国共产党。1964年因离婚问题被开除党籍，1968年恢复党籍。
description.en: Wang Jinshan joined the Communist Party of China in 1932. He was expelled from the party in 1964 over his divorce and his membership was restored in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 王近山出生于湖北省黄安县。
description.en: Wang Jinshan was born in Huang'an County, Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 王近山是小说《亮剑》中主角李云龙的人物原型之一。
description.en: Wang Jinshan is one of the real-life prototypes for Li Yunlong, the protagonist in the novel 'Drawing Sword'.

description.zh-cn: 1930年3月参加中国工农红军。
description.en: Joined the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army in March 1930.

description.zh-cn: 曾历任红四军第十师的班长、排长、连长、营长、团长，至1935年9月升任副师长。
description.en: Served successively as squad leader, platoon leader, company commander, battalion commander, and regiment commander in the 10th Division of the Fourth Red Army, rising to Deputy Division Commander by September 1935.

description.zh-cn: 随红四方面军参与长征。
description.en: Participated in the Long March with the Fourth Front Army.

relationships.target: 国民革命军第十八集团军第129师

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争爆发后，在八路军一二九师任职，至1942年5月升任三八六旅旅长。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, he served in the 129th Division of the Eighth Route Army, becoming commander of the 386th Brigade in May 1942.

description.zh-cn: 国共内战期间，先后担任晋冀鲁豫野战军和中原野战军第六纵队司令员。
description.en: During the Chinese Civil War, he served as the commander of the 6th Column in both the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan Field Army and the Central Plains Field Army.

description.zh-cn: 1951年率领第三兵团参加抗美援朝战争。
description.en: In 1951, he led the 3rd Army Group to participate in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 1952年指挥第十二军和第十五军参加上甘岭战役。
description.en: In 1952, he commanded the 12th and 15th Armies in the Battle of Triangle Hill.

description.zh-cn: 在上甘岭战役中，第十二军由王近山指挥。
description.en: During the Battle of Triangle Hill, the 12th Army was under the command of Wang Jinshan.

description.en: During the Battle of Triangle Hill, the 15th Army was under the command of Wang Jinshan.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 在韩岫岩的投诉下，妇联以生活作风问题为由将韩秀荣带走并发配到其他地区。
description.en: Following complaints from Han Xiuyan, the All-China Women's Federation took Han Xiurong away and exiled her to another region on grounds of 'lifestyle issues'.

description.zh-cn: 由于离婚事件被作为典型处理，王近山于1964年被撤销职务，降为大校，并被开除党籍，下放到农场。
description.en: As his divorce case was treated as a negative example, Wang Jinshan was dismissed from his posts, demoted to senior colonel, expelled from the Party, and sent down to a farm in 1964.

description.zh-cn: 在王近山写信承认错误后，毛泽东批示使其恢复副兵团级待遇并重新任职。
description.en: After Wang Jinshan wrote a letter admitting his mistakes, Mao Zedong approved his rehabilitation, restoring his deputy army group commander-level treatment and appointing him to a new post.

description.zh-cn: 1948年夏，作为中原野战军领导人一同合影。
description.en: In the summer of 1948, they were photographed together as leaders of the Central Plains Field Army.
